pr_title: Show option to open DevTools in browser during JxBrowser installation

timeline.message: Show open devtools in browser option during installation
Add presenting devtools option label and fix tests

timeline.bodyText:
We should word smith this error message.
How about
"The JxBrowser installation failed unexpectedly.  Restart your IDE to try again."
also change the label to
JX_BROWSER_INSTALLATION_FAILED
to clarify this is a failure.
timeline.author: jacob314

replies.bodyText: This is slightly different because it's installation.get() that threw an exception, but the message makes sense.
replies.author: helin24
